caption:
AHHHHHHH it’s recap time!
Hair Nah at the Smithsonian Museum was a success!! ✨🎉🙌🏾

SAAM Arcade 2024 was everything and more. 
So grateful to my team for helping to make this happen for me. 🥺 Avengers assemble!

It was amazing to see so many bonding over my work, laughing, learning, and playing. Kids yelling. Parents laughing. I even heard stories of people learning in real time. A woman went to reach for one of my representatives hair but stopped midway as she looked at the arcade and read the title Hair Nah aloud as someone was playing. To the Smithsonian team, thank you so much for the kindness and the opportunity. 

Hair Nah is currently ONLY showing at the Strong Museum of Play in New York.

Whoop!

#funny #familyfun #momopixel #hairnah #atsaam
